entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON

HIGHS AROUND 50
